message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $14,000. It's a great deal, and I'm sure you'll find it very valuable. Let me know what you think!
Hi Alice, I'm interested in your product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to stay within my budget.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $10,000 is just too low for me. I'm willing to come down a bit, but I need to get at least $12,500 for this product.  Let's keep talking.
Alice, I appreciate your flexibility, but $12,500 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer $11,250. I'm confident we can find a mutually beneficial price.
Bob, I understand your budget constraints. I'm willing to come down a bit further to $11,750. This price reflects the value of the product and gives you a fair deal. Let's try to close this deal.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $11,750 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to go up to $11,500, but that's as high as I can go. I'm really interested in this product, so I'm hoping we can meet at this price.
